summary: In 1979, filmmaker Trent Harris visits the small town of Beaver, Utah to film a talent show. Impressed by a performer called Groovin' Gary, he recreates Gary's act in 1981 with Sean Penn and in 1985 with Crispin Glover.
cast: Groovin' Gary|Sean Penn|Crispin Glover|Stefan Arngrim|John Bluto|Ken Butler|Lila Waters|Shane McCabe|Elizabeth Daily
keywords: video camera|drag|beaver utah|collection of short films|variety show
title: The Beaver Trilogy
